data.decision: Phase 1 plan refinements locked: (1) Episode: add context+constraints block + status open/closed. (2) Evaluation: normalize scores 0-5, tokens_bucket enum, add reproducibility. (3) Memory updates: cap confidence 0.05-0.99, deltas ±0.01/±0.02 max. (4) Facts: stored_confidence vs effective_confidence(computed), usage counters not single outcome. (5) Skills: seed 5 core skills upfront. (6) Order: directories+validators → MCP tools → apply_evaluation → THEN extend schemas. (7) Backward compat: safe defaults for old artifacts.
data.rationale: User refinements prevent "a lot of JSON that feels productive" trap. Key insights: normalize for machine-actionability, cap/floor to prevent nonsense, split stored vs computed confidence, seed skills to enable tracking from day 1, prove loop works before extending schemas.
